Hi,

The seesmic web client "https://seesmic.com/products/web" stop working after today nightly build. every time I try to access the application the user logged as "null" then redirect me to the seesmic home page.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: b.katbeh@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110415 Firefox/6.0a1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110415 Firefox/6.0a1

Hi,

The seesmic web client "https://seesmic.com/products/web" stop working after today nightly build. every time I try to access the application the user logged as "null" then redirect me to the seesmic home page.

Reproducible: Always
comments.author: b.katbeh@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: Is this bug still there? I think I remember they did an update on that day, making Seesmic very unstable for a few hours.
comments.creator: mathieu.marquer@gmail.com
comments.author: mathieu.marquer@gmail.com
comments.text: Is this bug still there? I think I remember they did an update on that day, making Seesmic very unstable for a few hours.
